```{r}
child_mortality_average_schooling_of_women <- 
  read.csv("~/R/Statistics_JWL/data/infant_mortality/correlation-between-child-mortality-and-mean-years-of-schooling-for-those-aged-15-and-older.csv")

names(child_mortality_average_schooling_of_women) <- 
  c("Entity", "Code", "Year", "MR", "YEW15", "POP")

child_mortality_average_schooling_of_women <- na.omit(child_mortality_average_schooling_of_women)[ ,1:6]
```
